item.title: (WIP) Computational Data Analytics (Machine Learning 1)
item.description:
1. Introduction
  2. Clustering
  3. PCA
  4. Density Estimation
  5. Gaussian Mixture Model and EM Algorithm
  6. Optimization
  7. Classification
  8. Support Vector Machines
  9. Introduction to Neural Nets
  10. Boosting
  11. Random Forest
  12. Cross Validation

Introduction

Application Desired Outcomes Inputs (Data) Learning Paradigms
Image Classification Classify objects in images Labeled images Supervised Learning
Natural Language Processing (NLP) Text understanding, sentiment analysis Text data, language corpora Supervised/Unsupervised Learning
Speech Recognition Convert spoken language to text Audio data Supervised Learning
Fraud Detection Identify fraudulent transactions Transaction data, labeled instances Supervised Learning
Recommender Systems Recommend products, movies, etc. to users User-item interactions, preferences Collaborative Filtering, Content-Based, Hybrid
Autonomous Vehicles Navigate and drive without human intervention Sensor data (cameras, LiDAR, etc.) Reinforcement Learning
Medical Diagnosis Diagnose diseases or conditions Patient data, medical records Supervised Learning
Sentiment Analysis Determine sentiment (positive/negative) Text data (reviews, social media) Supervised Learning
Time Series Forecasting Predict future values in time series data Historical time series data Supervised/Unsupervised Learning
Virtual Assistants Provide intelligent responses and assistance Voice/text data, user interactions NLP, Supervised Learning
Finding Communities Identify groups of densely connected nodes Network/graph data Unsupervised Learning
Spam Detection Identify and filter out spam emails/messages Email/text data Supervised Learning
Novelty Detection Detect anomalies or new patterns Feature vectors, sensor data Unsupervised Learning

Prerequisites

Probabilities

  • Distribution
  • Densities
  • Marginalization
  • Conditioning

Statistics

  • Mean
  • Variance
  • Maximum Likelihood Estimation

Linear Algebra

  • Vector
  • Matrix
  • Multiplication
  • Inversion
  • Eigen-decomposition

Algorithms and Programming

  • Basic Data Structures
  • Computational Complexity

Convex optimization
